How to Win?

The Grand Escape

Without being caught by the Police, the Boss gains 4 points

Loner

After 3 rounds, the Boss doesn't have 4 points

The Grand Escape

The Police chooses the same location as the Boss

Commands

/start

Type the command in a text channel to start the game.

/stop

Type the command in the text channel to stop the game.

/restart

Type the command in the text channel to restart the game.

/join

Players could type this command in the text channel to join the game.

/goto [location]

This command is used to set the player's location.

[location] is one of the following values: airport, bar, casino, hotel, villa

/barrier [location]

This command is for the Police to set their barrier.

[location] is one of the following values: airport, bar, casino, hotel, villa

/reveal

This command reveals everyone's location in one round.

/history

This command logs all the game history.
